name: Hotfix - the game
description:
So, I went the last three days of the game jam with little to no rest trying to complete this project when suddenly there were bugs everywhere.  I tried to salvage what I could, but not even I could repair my own game.

HEY YOU! YEAH YOU! The person reading this! Perhaps you have what it takes to make this buggy game playable again. I've attached a downloadable file  if you want to give it a shot. 

*note: In all seriousness I ran out of time on this game jam, but there is enough to give about half an hour of frustration fun. I am told by some that this game is INCREDIBLY HARD, so you have been warned!
